secret_not_exist: The requested secret does not exist. Please check the secret name!
init_vault_fail: Failed to initialize vault. Please check URL of Credential Store or Vault Server!
vault_not_initialized: Failed to unseal the vault. Please check if the vault is initialized or not!
init_vault_fail_due_to_parameter: Failed to initialize vault. Please check parameters: shares should be integer equal or greater than 1; threshold should be integer equal or less than shares. If shares > 1 then threshold must be larger than 1.
bad_request_write_dksecret: Lack of query parameters 'name' and/or 'value' or 'service'!
write_dksecret_success: Create docker secret and distribute it to service/ application container successfully!
